bibl.title: Some Egyptian Glasses Dated by Royal Inscriptions.
bibl.note: Inclut (pp. 13-15) l'analyse de 2 plaques de fondation du temple d'Osiris à Canope dédié par Ptolémée III et Bérénice (246-221 a.C.) [ed.: David M. Bailey, Glass plaques from a Foundation Deposit at Canopus, Egypt, AntJ 64 (1984) pp. 389-393, pl. L d].
Bimson M. and I.C. Freestone, Some Egyptian Glasses Dated by Royal Inscriptions.
